name: Hoola-Loop
description:
**IMPORTANT**  The Web Version Needs To Be Played At Full Screen For Best Experience! (Press the Blue Button) About

Hoola-Loop was made for the Black and White game Jam. 

The game is all about keeping four hoola-hoopers, hoola-hooping. They will slowly get tired during the game and its your job to keep them going.

Use the left and right arrow keys to boost their hoola-hooping. 

Don't let any of the hoola-hoopers stop, if so you will lose the game.

I used only two colors, Black and White and changed the opacity of 4 objects.

Controls

Left & Right Arrow Keys - Keep hoola-hooping

1,2,3,4 Number keys - Switch between characters

Thank you for checking out my game!
